# True Draaki
## Overview
You have unlocked the true potential of the [[Draaki|draaki]] race, exhibiting all traits of [[Draaki|draaki]]-kind.

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *You must have taken the [[Wyrmblooded Paragon]] feat 4 times, gaining all* *[[Draaki|draaki]]** subtypes.*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- You may, as a reaction to taking damage to which you are resistant due to your [[Draaki|draaki]] subtypes, tap into your inner reservoirs of strength and expend a use of a breath weapon whose energy damage corresponds to the damage youâ€™ve taken. If you do, you negate the damage and become immune to the damage type for 1 minute.
- You increase the damage dice of all your [[Draaki|draaki]] breath weapons by +1d6.
